create:def.description: Creates a project-scratch-def.json file based on metadata scanned from your project
examples:
$ sfdx create:def -p /Users/myUser/mySFProject/src
  We've successfully created a project-scratch-def.json for you!

$ sfdx create:def -p /Users/myUser/mySFProject/src -e developer
  We've successfully created a project-scratch-def.json for you!

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

path.name: path
path.description: file path to your project's metadata

edition.name: edition
edition.description: salesforce org edition you want to generate the definition for
